name: Create LionDesk contacts from Google Sheets rows
description: Every time a new row is added to a Google Sheet, Make will automatically validate the email address from the Google Sheet. If the status of the email is "valid", it will look that person up using Clearbit and create a contact in LionDesk. It will also update the Google Sheet with the data from Clearbit. This examples uses the sheet in [this link](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1I_0ORbuaKUyehO5qj7l3iWRNYELfAuG5lQzLfyuSw9A/edit#gid=0).
